content.description: Each night before bed, Raymond enjoys drinking a cup of tea. He enjoys the scent of fragrant teas because the scent enhances the flavor of the tea. During a recent bad cold, Raymond lost his enjoyment for drinking tea.
content.question: Which of the following concepts best explains why Raymond lost his enjoyment for drinking tea during his cold?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
